body: Bypassing traps, breaking locks, and stealing treasure are your areas of expertise, and few can match your skill. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—astounding disable, crime spree, impeccable balance, nimble glide, ranged disable, thwart detection, trap taker, wall run; 3rd-Tier Abilities—vanishing move; 6th-Tier Abilities—steal power.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/6th-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Trickster Builds/Supreme Thief
name: Supreme Thief
